name: Beet & Spud
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2023 (PolyJam site) by j4nw and Cerulean

Beet & Spud is a 2 player co-op tower defense game. Grow cabbage into children, then give them fancy hats to teach them responsible adult jobs, so they can better protect your farm from exploding cyber-bugs.

(Game restarts in a broken state after a game-over, you gotta refresh the window.)
